name: Mask Kid
description:
Wear a mask, be a hero.

Description  :

The pandemic is upon us ! We have a set of rules to survive but well... not everyone is following them. You play as Mask Kid, someone doing their best to make a difference .Play through a succession of scenarios based on real life situations and do the correct thing to lower the Rt!

Mask Kid is made for "Jamming the Curve" game jam. 

How to play:

Mask Kid consists series of minigames which all of them can be played with mouse.
